author: Smallsam99
title: nice little fish!
review: Okay I am first to review this set because no one else will. It is great for a lego ocean. It is a whale that can be used for good and practical reasons. It is a sturdy and strong little set and it is good because I only bought it for 1 dollar.Overall if you want a nice little fish or whale edition to an ocean scene this is a good set to get.

author: asianlego
title: Cute Aquatic Animal!
review:
The whale is really cute! It reminds me of the simpler LEGO days a decade ago where many kids owned very tiny sets like this. I like the use of the trans blue flame piece as a water spout. But I must say that the Whale looks more like shark, except without a dorsal fin.

-asianlego

author: Xwing250
title: Kinda Good
review: This is kind of cute. I dont mind it. It is probably the worst set in the DM collection. It has some nice features, like the spurting water, fins and its cuteness. Like some of the other DM sets its kind of good for stop motion films. Easy to build and great to play with.

author: tkettle9719
title: Whale Tale, but Cuter and better
review:
This is one of the sets from the Mr. Magorium Creator set, and is probably my favorite animal set in it.

Pros

  • The back tail moves, which is just a nice playability feature.
  • The blue fire piece is very creatively used here.

Cons

  • The gray parts seem just a bit wrong on this, light blue would be better.
  • The eyes make it seem a bit mysterious, sharky.

I really like this set; it's small, but it works really well, and has a great design. I recommend buying the whole Mr. Magorium set.
